Preconditions: Registered user exists with username testuser and valid password.
Steps: 1. Navigate to DemoBlaze login page. 2. Enter valid username and password. 3. Click Log in.
Expected Result: User is redirected to homepage; header shows “Welcome testuser”.

Steps: 1. Navigate to login page. 2. Enter valid username and an incorrect password. 3. Click Log in.
Expected Result: Error message “Wrong password” appears; user remains on login screen.

Description: Add multiple quantities of same product (edge/boundary)
Preconditions: Product has at least 5 in stock.
Steps: 1. Open product page. 2. Click Add to cart five times.
Expected Result: Cart counter increases accordingly; cart shows correct quantity (5).

Description: Checkout with invalid card number (failure path)
Preconditions: At least one item is in the cart.
Steps: 1. Click Cart ? Place Order. 2. Enter valid shipping info and an invalid card number (e.g., 1111-1111-1111-1111). 3. Click Purchase.
Expected Result: Transaction is declined; clear error message displayed; order is not created.
